::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Megatron, one eyebrow slightly raised. He nods as Hell Beast 
and Megatron complete their arguments and Megatron sticks out his hand.

He stands up. "Excelent. I suggest we go see the maximals ... in person. 
Perhaps with several troups."
